name: stahlregen + shifter + flexi - hypnotron v1-0
milkdrop_raw:
MILKDROP_PRESET_VERSION=201
PSVERSION=2
PSVERSION_WARP=2
PSVERSION_COMP=2
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=2.000
fDecay=0.980
fVideoEchoZoom=2.000
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.000
nVideoEchoOrientation=0
nWaveMode=0

bWaveDots=0

bDarkenCenter=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0

bInvert=0

fWaveScale=1.000

fWaveParam=0.000

fModWaveAlphaEnd=2.000

b2n=0.000
b3n=0.000

b3x=1.000

wavecode_0_samples=512

wavecode_0_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_0_bUseDots=0
wavecode_0_bDrawThick=1
wavecode_0_bAdditive=1

wavecode_0_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_0_r=0.000
wavecode_0_g=1.000
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=1.000
wave_0_per_frame1=// Custom wave code by shifter!
wave_0_per_frame2=
wave_0_per_frame3=q1 = 1;
wave_0_per_point1=// Custom wave code by shifter!
wave_0_per_point2=
wave_0_per_point3=
wave_0_per_point4=it = (it + 1)*above(sample,0)*below(it,53);
wave_0_per_point5=ita = (ita + equal(it,0))*above(sample,0);
wave_0_per_point6=
wave_0_per_point7=sw = 1-equal(it,0)*equal(ita,0);
wave_0_per_point8=swi = (equal(lr,9) + equal(lr,5))*equal(it,0)*equal(ita,4);
wave_0_per_point9=xv = if(sw - swi,xv,rand(1001)*.001*.8);
wave_0_per_point10=mx = xv + ita*.025;
wave_0_per_point11=my = if(sw - swi,my,rand(1001)*.001*.975);
wave_0_per_point12=
wave_0_per_point13=sz = .01;
wave_0_per_point14=vx = above(it,1)*below(it,39) + above(it,12)*below(it,28) - equal(it,20) + equal(it,46) + equal(it,51) + equal(it,41) - equal(it,15) - equal(it,25) + equal(it,10) + equal(it,30) - equal(it,4) - equal(it,36);
wave_0_per_point15=vy = above(it,17)*below(it,49) + above(it,22)*below(it,44) - equal(it,33) + equal(it,7) + equal(it,51) + equal(it,15) - equal(it,41) - equal(it,25) + equal(it,4) + equal(it,10) - equal(it,36) - equal(it,30);
wave_0_per_point16=
wave_0_per_point17=sa = equal(ita,0)*20 + equal(ita,1)*18 + equal(ita,2)*21 + equal(ita,3)*19 + equal(ita,4)*20 + equal(ita,6)*21 + equal(ita,7)*19;
wave_0_per_point18=sb = equal(ita,0)*2 + equal(ita,1)*21 + equal(ita,2)*25 + equal(ita,4)*13 + equal(ita,5)*15 + equal(ita,6)*18 + equal(ita,7)*5;
wave_0_per_point19=sc = equal(ita,0)*3 + equal(ita,1)*15 + equal(ita,2)*14 + equal(ita,3)*19 + equal(ita,4)*21 + equal(ita,5)*13 + equal(ita,6)*5;
wave_0_per_point20=sd = equal(ita,0)*12 + equal(ita,1)*15 + equal(ita,2)*22 + equal(ita,3)*5 + equal(ita,5)*21 + equal(ita,6)*19;
wave_0_per_point21=se = equal(ita,0)*16 + equal(ita,1)*18 + equal(ita,2)*15 + equal(ita,3)*4 + equal(ita,4)*21 + equal(ita,5)*3 +equal(ita,6)*5;
wave_0_per_point22=sg = equal(ita,0)*3 + equal(ita,1)*15 + equal(ita,2)*13 + equal(ita,3)*16 + equal(ita,4)*12 + equal(ita,5)*25;
wave_0_per_point23=sf = equal(ita,0)*15 + equal(ita,1)*2 + equal(ita,2)*5 + equal(ita,3)*25;
wave_0_per_point24=sh = equal(ita,0)*23 + equal(ita,1)*15 + equal(ita,2)*18 + equal(ita,3)*11;
wave_0_per_point25=
wave_0_per_point26=lr = if(sw,lr,rand(10));
wave_0_per_point27=let = equal(lr,0)*sa + equal(lr,1)*sb + equal(lr,2)*sc + equal(lr,3)*sd + equal(lr,4)*se + equal(lr,5)*sf + equal(lr,6)*sg + equal(lr,7)*sh + equal(lr,8)*si + equal(lr,9)*sj;
wave_0_per_point28=
wave_0_per_point29=va = equal(let,23) + equal(let,24) + equal(let,26);
wave_0_per_point30=vb = above(let,0)*below(let,9) + above(let,10)*below(let,19) + equal(let,21) + equal(let,23);
wave_0_per_point31=vc = equal(let,1) + equal(let,2) + equal(let,5) + equal(let,6) + equal(let,8) + equal(let,11) + equal(let,16) + equal(let,18) + equal(let,19);
wave_0_per_point32=vd = above(let,1)*below(let,9) + above(let,10)*below(let,24) - equal(let,20);
wave_0_per_point33=ve = equal(let,13) + equal(let,14) + equal(let,24) + equal(let,25);
wave_0_per_point34=vf = above(let,1)*below(let,8) + equal(let,9) + above(let,14)*below(let,21) + equal(let,26);
wave_0_per_point35=vg = equal(let,1);
wave_0_per_point36=vh = equal(let,9) + equal(let,20);
wave_0_per_point37=vi = above(let,0)*below(let,5) - equal(let,3) + equal(let,18);
wave_0_per_point38=vj = above(let,2)*below(let,8) - equal(let,4) + equal(let,9) + above(let,14)*below(let,21) - equal(let,18) + equal(let,26);
wave_0_per_point39=vk = equal(let,11) + equal(let,13) + above(let,23)*below(let,27);
wave_0_per_point40=vl = equal(let,8) + equal(let,10) + above(let,12)*below(let,18) + above(let,20)*below(let,24);
wave_0_per_point41=vm = equal(let,1) + equal(let,2) + equal(let,8) + equal(let,16) + equal(let,18) + equal(let,19);
wave_0_per_point42=vn = equal(let,1) + equal(let,7) + equal(let,8) + equal(let,10) + above(let,12)*below(let,24) - equal(let,16) - equal(let,18) - equal(let,20) - equal(let,22);
wave_0_per_point43=vo = equal(let,11) + equal(let,14) + equal(let,17) + equal(let,18) + equal(let,23) + equal(let,24);
wave_0_per_point44=vp = equal(let,3) + equal(let,5) + equal(let,7) + equal(let,9) + equal(let,10) + equal(let,12) + equal(let,15) + equal(let,17) + equal(let,19) + equal(let,21) + equal(let,26);
wave_0_per_point45=vq = equal(let,2) + equal(let,4) + equal(let,22);
wave_0_per_point46=vr = equal(let,9) + equal(let,20) + equal(let,25);
wave_0_per_point47=vs = equal(let,22);
wave_0_per_point48=vt = above(let,1)*below(let,13) - equal(let,6) - equal(let,8) - equal(let,11) + equal(let,15) + equal(let,17) + equal(let,19) + equal(let,21) + equal(let,26);
wave_0_per_point49=
wave_0_per_point50=a = if(above(it,51),0,if(above(it,49),va,if(above(it,47),vb,if(above(it,44),vc,if(above(it,42),vd,if(above(it,39),ve, if(above(it,37),vf,if(above(it,34),vg,if(above(it,31),vh,if(above(it,28),vi,if(above(it,26),vj,if(above(it,23),vk, if(above(it,21),vl,if(above(it,18),vm,if(above(it,16),vn,if(above(it,13),vo,if(above(it,11),vp,if(above(it,8),vq, if(above(it,5),vr,if(above(it,2),vs,if(it,vt,0)))))))))))))))))))));
wave_0_per_point51=
wave_0_per_point52=a = a*below(ita,8)*q1;
wave_0_per_point53=
wave_0_per_point54=x = mx + vx*sz*.75;
wave_0_per_point55=y = my + vy*sz*1.5;

shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=//Dedicated to flexi, the guy with the crazy unspellable name, hexcollie, 
per_frame_2=//goody, bdrv and all the other freaks at the winamp forums! :P
per_frame_3=//TRUST US! COMPLY! WORK! PRODUCE! CONSUME! BUY MORE! LOVE US! OBEY! GLORY TO THE HYPNOTRON! 
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=vol = (bass_att+treb_att+mid_att)*.125;
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=volb = .7*volb + .3*vol;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=warp = .1+.1*volb;
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=volt = volt + .1*volb;
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=q1 = time+volt;
per_frame_15=q2 = aspectx;
per_frame_16=q3 = aspecty;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`// sample previous frame
warp_5=`ret.xy = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xy;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`//float better_ang = atan2((uv.y - 0.5), (uv.x - 0.5));
warp_8=`float better_rad = length((uv - 0.5)*_qa.zy);
warp_9=`//float3 hue_plus = hue_shader*8-7.25;
warp_10=`    
warp_11=`// darken (decay) over time
warp_12=`ret.y = (ret.y*.96)-0.004;
warp_13=`ret.x *= .7;
warp_14=`
warp_15=`ret.z = lerp(1,-.5,frac(-better_rad*8-_qa.x+0.1595*ang))*3*rad-.1;
warp_16=`ret.z *= 1;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`float2    d = texsize.zw*8;
comp_5=`float3    dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_6=`float3    dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_7=`float2    uv_z = uv+float2(dx.z,dy.z)*0.6;
comp_8=`
comp_9=`d = texsize.zw*2;
comp_10=`dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_11=`dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_12=`float2    uv_y = uv+float2(dx.y,dy.y)*0.2;
comp_13=`
comp_14=`ret = lerp(0,.6,GetPixel(uv).z);
comp_15=`ret = lerp(ret,lum(tex2D(sampler_noise_lq,uv)),GetPixel(uv).x*2);
comp_16=`ret += float3(.25,.25,.25)*lum(GetPixel(uv_z));
comp_17=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(2,-2,-2),GetBlur1(uv).y);
comp_18=`ret += .9*GetPixel(uv_y).y*float3(1,.75,.6);
comp_19=`
comp_20=`ret *= 1.00; //gamma
comp_21=`
comp_22=`}
